Title: Establishes the department of health as the agency to provide proof of Medicaid eligibility when requested by a recipient or his or her designated representative
Summary: Establishes the department of health as the agency to provide proof of Medicaid eligibility when requested by a recipient or his or her designated representative.
LawCode: Amd ยง366-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing the department of health as the agency to provide proof of Medicaid eligibility when requested by a recipient or his or her designated representative
